backgrounds.name: Mechanical Engineer
backgrounds.desc: You speak the language of pistons and gears. You believe anything can be fixed with percussive maintenance.

backgrounds.name: Computer Engineer
backgrounds.desc: OSINT wizard. You see the world as matrix code. You prefer terminals to people.

backgrounds.name: The Architect
backgrounds.desc: Structure and Beauty. You judge civilizations by their load-bearing walls.

backgrounds.name: The Doctor
backgrounds.desc: Healer of biological hardware. You have steady hands and zero patience for stupidity.

backgrounds.name: The Historian
backgrounds.desc: You know who died, when they died, and why their hat was fashionable. Time is your library.

backgrounds.name: The Artist
backgrounds.desc: You see colors others ignore. You're here to capture the soul of the timeline.

backgrounds.name: The Popstar
backgrounds.desc: Charisma weaponized. You can charm a king or start a riot with a microphone.

backgrounds.name: The Actor
backgrounds.desc: Master of disguise. You don't just visit history; you blend in.

backgrounds.name: The Athlete
backgrounds.desc: Peak physical condition. You run towards explosions while others run away.

backgrounds.name: The Adventurer
backgrounds.desc: Jack of all trades. You have a map in your head and a multitool in your pocket.

backgrounds.name: The Sailor
backgrounds.desc: Navigator of stars and seas. You know that the ocean is the only thing scarier than time.
